description: Sample embeddings structure for CV sections
note: This file shows the expected structure after DistilBERT embeddings are computed

computationStrategy.keywords: Average embeddings of all keywords in the array
computationStrategy.responses: Individual embeddings for each conversation style
computationStrategy.combined: Weighted average of keywords (0.4) + all responses (0.6)
computationStrategy.similarity: Cosine similarity between query embedding and combined section embedding

usage.runtime: Embeddings computed by ML Worker on first load
usage.caching: Stored in memory for session duration
usage.matching: Query embeddings compared against section embeddings
usage.ranking: Sections ranked by similarity score for response generation
